verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah, hallelujah! He’s my Lord! Hoseanna, hoseanna! He’s my Lord! He’s the Lily of the Valley He’s my Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s the fairest of ten thousand He’s my Lord! He’s my Lord! He’s my Lord. He’s my Lord! He’s my Lord.{/lang-eng}
